title: Hi, I'm Nithin
description: Passionate developer skilled in React Native, MERN Stack, and game development with experience in Godot and Unity. Currently pursuing a B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, with an interest in open-source contributions. Focused on developing innovative solutions with a deep love for coding.

title: Game Development
